00013 #ifndef _IHOOK_HELPER_H_
00014 #define _IHOOK_HELPER_H_
00015 
00016 #include <inttypes.h>
00017 #include <stdlib.h>
00018 #include "../../list.h"
00019 
00020 typedef int (*fcn_hook_t)(void *);
00021 
00022 typedef struct {
00023   const char *module;
00024   const char *name;
00025   fcn_hook_t fcn;
00026 } hook_table_entry_t;
00027 
00028 typedef struct {
00029   int type; //0: data, 1: pointer
00030   int dir;  //0: in, 1: out, 2: in & out
00031   int size; //0: string, -1: wide string, >0: actual size
00032 } argument_info_t;
00033 
00034 typedef struct {
00035   char function_name[128];
00036   int nr_args;
00037   argument_info_t arguments[12];
00038   int has_retval;
00039   uint32_t call_no;
00040   uint32_t hook_handle;
00041   uint32_t stack[13];
00042 } function_hook_info_t;
00043 
00044 
00045 class ihook_helper_t {
00046   public:
00047   virtual ~ihook_helper_t(){};
00048   virtual void function_call_entry(function_hook_info_t *hook_info) = 0;
00049   virtual void function_call_return(function_hook_info_t *hook_info) = 0;
00050   virtual int  immediate_return(function_hook_info_t *hook_info, int pop_args) = 0;
00051   virtual void hook_return_address(function_hook_info_t *hook_info, fcn_hook_t hook_proc) = 0;
00052   virtual void set_hooks(hook_table_entry_t *hook_table) = 0;
00053 };
00054 
00055 #endif //_IHOOK_HELPER_H_
